'The Giants' is a 1974 album featuring Oscar Peterson, Joe Pass, and Ray Brown.
At the Grammy Awards of 1978, Peterson won the Grammy Award for Best Jazz
Performance by a Soloist for his performance on this album. It was
reissued on CD in 1995 by Original Jazz Classics.
